SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class ParStyle

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.ParStyle
public class ParStyle extends Object
Represents paragraph-level styling attributes for a rich text editor.

This includes alignment, spacing, margins, background color, and list information such as type and indentation level.

  • Field Details

    • EMPTY

      public static final ParStyle EMPTY
      A predefined empty/default paragraph style.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParStyle

      public ParStyle(javafx.scene.text.TextAlignment alignment, double lineSpacing, double leftMargin, double rightMargin, double topMargin, double bottomMargin, javafx.scene.paint.Color backgroundColor, ParStyle.ListType listType, int listLevel)
      Constructs a new ParStyle with all properties specified.
      Parameters:
      alignment - the text alignment
      lineSpacing - the line spacing multiplier
      leftMargin - left margin in pixels
      rightMargin - right margin in pixels
      topMargin - top margin in pixels
      bottomMargin - bottom margin in pixels
      backgroundColor - the background color
      listType - the type of list formatting
      listLevel - the level of list nesting

    • setListType

      public ParStyle setListType(ParStyle.ListType listType)
      Returns a copy of this style with updated list type. Automatically adjusts list level: 1 for BULLET/NUMBERED, 0 for NONE.

    • getListLevel

      public int getListLevel()

    • setListLevel

      public ParStyle setListLevel(int currentListLevel)
      Returns a copy of this style with an explicitly set list level.

    • increaseListLevel

      public ParStyle increaseListLevel(int currentListLevel)
      Returns a copy of this style with an increased list level, up to a maximum of 5.

    • decreaseListLevel

      public ParStyle decreaseListLevel(int currentListLevel)
      Returns a copy of this style with a decreased list level. If the current level is 1, resets list type to NONE and level to 0.

    • apply

      public static void apply(javafx.scene.text.TextFlow textFlow, ParStyle style)
      Applies the given ParStyle properties to a TextFlow node.
      Parameters:
      textFlow - the TextFlow to apply styles to
      style - the ParStyle object containing paragraph formatting
